title: Markets 'functioning very well': Mnuchin
text:
Markets 'functioning very well': Mnuchin 12:33pm EST - 00:55 
When asked Tuesday about the volatility of the stock markets over the past few days, U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin told a House hearing that the markets are ''functioning very well.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
When asked Tuesday about the volatility of the stock markets over the past few days, U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin told a House hearing that the markets are "functioning very well." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2BJwCJN
